thread.title: NFL Week 6 point spreads, over/under: Bills a pick 'em against Bengals
thread.title_full: NFL Week 6 point spreads, over/under: Bills a pick 'em against Bengals | syracuse.com

author: Matthew Fairburn | mfairburn@syracuse.com
title: NFL Week 6 point spreads, over/under: Bills a pick 'em against Bengals
text:
Nashville, Tenn. â€” Despite a pair of ugly performances, the Buffalo Bills have opened as a pick'em heading into a Week 6 home game against the Cincinnati Bengals.
The Bengals, who have a perfect 5-0 record, open as even money with the Bills a week after pulling off an incredible comeback win against the Seattle Seahawks. The Bills, meanwhile, are fresh off a 14-13 win over the Tennessee Titans on the road.
The line could shift throughout the week depending on the availability of some of the Bills' star players, namely wide receiver Sammy Watkins.
Below are the odds for NFL games next week courtesy of America's Line.
